sentences.en: A class or interface member was marked with an invalid access modifier.
sentences.cn: 类或接口成员是用无效的访问修饰符标记的.

sentences.en: A modifier may accept additional parameters that affect its behavior.
sentences.cn: 变量调节器由赋予的参数值决定其行为.

sentences.en: A weasel word is a modifier that almost contradicts the claim that is made.
sentences.cn: “鼬鼠”型的词语是一种修饰语，与广告词的意思几乎是相矛盾的。

sentences.en: Do the adverbial modifier , have seven meanings generally in participle.
sentences.cn: 分词做状语, 概有七意义.

sentences.en: Fixed bonus to Undead damage modifier to work with ranged weapons.
sentences.cn: 对用工作不死了损坏修改者固定的补贴射程武器.

sentences.en: I circle a misplaced modifier and wait as they make the fix.
sentences.cn: 我会圈出用错的修饰语，等他们自己修改。

sentences.en: If limited slip differential chatter occurs, add friction modifier additive.
sentences.cn: 限滑差速器,如果发生颤振, 添加摩擦改进剂的添加剂.

sentences.en: If limited slip differential chatter occurs, addAMSOIL Slip - Lock? friction modifier additive.
sentences.cn: 限滑差速器,如果发生颤振, 添加AMSOIL滑锁? 摩擦改进剂的添加剂.

sentences.en: If you also had Currency, then the modifier would be 1.4.
sentences.cn: 如果同时掌握货币, 则修正值应为1.4.

sentences.en: It can serve as subject, predicate, object, attribute and adverbial modifier.
sentences.cn: 可以作主语 、 谓语 、 宾语 、 定语、状语.

sentences.en: It is reference to synthesize core - shell elastomers for impact modifier.
sentences.cn: 其目的是为合成抗冲改性用核 - 壳弹性体提供参考.

sentences.en: Recommended dosage: modifier 0.2 % ( dry powder dollars ), by 0.1 % emulsified oil.
sentences.cn: 建议添加量: 改良剂0.2% ( 干粉计 ), 乳化油0.

sentences.en: The caster's Spellcraft skill modifier is vital for casting an epic spell.
sentences.cn: 施法者的法术辨识技能等级对于施展传奇法术至关重要.

sentences.en: The DC modifier of an unanswered psionic attack mode is + 8.
sentences.cn: 未得到回应的心灵攻击模式的dc调整值为+.

sentences.en: The paper introduces a new type composite modifier and modification technology.
sentences.cn: 介绍了一种新型复合变质剂及其变质工艺.

sentences.en: Tool sends e - mail to the assigned Modifier and the Originator.
sentences.cn: 变更控制工具 发电子邮件 给已指定的修改人和发起人.

sentences.en: When equipped with TRAC - LOK, include 4 ounces of Friction Modifier Additive.
sentences.cn: 当装配有TRAC-LOK时, 应含4盎司的摩擦修正添加剂.

words.tran_cn: [助剂]改性剂；[语]修饰语；修正的人

trans.tran_en: a word or group of words that gives additional information about another word. Modifiers can be adjectives (such as ‘fierce’ in ‘the fierce dog’), adverbs (such as ‘loudly’ in ‘the dog barked loudly’), or phrases (such as ‘with a short tail’ in ‘the dog with a short tail’).
